title: Cards of Love: The Fool
description: The Fool is young, innocent. A blank slate. She sets off on her journey, unaware of the danger that lies in her path. Unaware that one more step will send her tumbling off the edge of a cliff. The warnings are everywhere. Why won't she heed them? Is she naive?Or simply unaware of the danger she is in? Is she truly a little fool?Or is that just the name the stranger calls her before his kiss claims her forever?
author: Theresa Leigh
